about_the_game:
It's time to unleash your inner Warrior! Battle Runner is a casual runner with difficult, random, procedurally generated levels. You're the fighter, travelling to new lands seeking quests, fame and an adventure - time waits for no one so you'll have to run fast, and there will be many obstacles in your way which you'll have to pass through carefully.

Controls:
LMB (Left Mouse Button)
'W' Key
'Up' Arrow key




I have been learning to make games in my free time and love making small arcade and mini games with simple mechanics. Please expect 'Battle Runner' to be a small,
re-playable, score-chaser game where the only goals are to constantly beat your previous score.

Music for the game is royalty-free under the cc0 and was created by Phyrnna.

name: Battle Runner

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.6ghz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.6ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB
  • Storage: 60 MB available space

You're the fighter, travelling to new lands seeking quests, fame and an adventure - time waits for no one so you'll have to run fast, and there will be many obstacles in your way.
